metadata.Title: CVE-2016-9642 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
JavaScriptCore in WebKit allows attackers to cause a denial of service (out-of-bounds heap read) via a crafted Javascript file.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2016-9642` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-4.0 - 2.16.1-1
gir1.2-webkit2-4.0 - 2.16.1-1
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-18 - 2.16.1-1
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-bin - 2.16.1-1
libwebkit2gtk-4.0-37 - 2.16.1-1
webkit2gtk-driver - 2.16.1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: qtwebkit-opensource-src package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
webkit2gtk package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.16.1-1').
